title.narrative: Technical Assistance Of Un-Habitat For The Housing Sector Profile For Cabo Verde

description.narrative: The main objective of the project is to collaborate with the Government of the Republic of Cabo Verde through the provision of technical assistance in an integrated and participatory diagnostic for the elaboration of a Housing Sector Profile.The Housing Sector Profile of Cabo Verde will provide a comprehensive in-depth analysis of the urban housing sector, focusing on its strengths and weaknesses. The Profile will contribute to the creation of a framework that enables provision of adequate housing for all. It will build a comprehensive understanding of the functioning of the urban housing sector that can serve as authoritative reference for all actors in the housing sector, through a series of recommendations for policy design to the key stakeholders in the housing delivery system, including prioritized actions necessary for its improvement will be provided.

participating-org.narrative: United Nations Trust Fund for Human Security

mailing-address.narrative: UN-HABITAT P.O. Box 30030 GPO Nairobi 00100 Kenya

title.narrative: Government and partners are mobilised and sensitised regarding the main results of the Housing Sector Profile with the aim of elaborating a National Housing Policy.

description.narrative: Government and partners are mobilised and sensitised regarding the main results of the Housing Sector Profile with the aim of elaborating a National Housing Policy.

title.narrative: Quantity of key stakeholders and institutions engaged on the elaboration of a National Housing Policy

description.narrative: Quantity of key stakeholders and institutions engaged on the elaboration of a National Housing Policy

target.value: 5 (MIOTH, INGT and at least three municipalities)

title.narrative: The Government of Cabo Verde, key institutions and stakeholders and the general public are more aware of the current challenges of the housing sector in Cabo Verde.

title.narrative: Quantity of key stakeholders and institutions adopting the Housing Profile Sector as a tool for Policy formulation
